column1: Below is a list of cities and towns (together 141) in Slovakia. This list of cities and towns shows the city/town names first
column2: region and then the town's population as of 2018-12-31. (For German and Hungarian names of these towns
column3: which are used by the respective ethnic minorities
column4: see articles list of German exonyms for places in Slovakia and list of Hungarian exonyms for places in Slovakia).
